name: Hangman - A Simple 3D Hangman game
description:
Play a nice simple casual Hangman game.

Features: 

  • Play with over 1'000 built in words, or add your custom words to guess!
  • Find the Easter Egg!
  • ...Its a Hangman game, what else do you need?

//Side Note from the developer
This was my first game using my own engine, hence why I've chosen a "boring" game concept.  Have fun!
